bibl.title: with contributions by Jean BINGEN, Jean-Michel CARRIÉ, Seán GODDARD, Sheila HAMILTON-DYER, Valerie A. MAXFIELD, David P.S. PEACOCK, Marijke VAN DER VEEN and Sue WINTERBOTTOM, Survey and Excavation. Mons Claudianus 1987-1993. Volume II: Excavations. Part 1.

series.title: Fouilles de l'Institut français d'Archéologie orientale.

bibl.note: Vol. I: 1997. - Pp. 1-4: V.A.M. and D.P.S.P., Preface and Acknowledgements. - 1. General Introduction (V.A.M. and D.P.S.P.). - 2. Excavation of the Fort Gate (D.P.S.P.). - 3. The North-East Corner of the Fort (V.A.M.). - 4. The South-East Corner of the Annexe (V.A.M.). - 5. The Southern Sebakh (V.A.M. and J.B.). - 6. Le temple de Sérapis (J.-M.C.). - 7. L'hydreuma (J.-M.C.). - 8. The Botanical Evidence (M.V.D.V.). - 9. The Faunal Remains (S.H.-D.). - 10. Leather (S.W.). - 11. Objects of Bone, Horn and Shell (S.H.-D.). - 12. Wooden Objects (S.H.-D. and S.G.), with notes on the label texts [p. 372] (J.B.). - 13. Portable Stone Artefacts (D.P.S.P.). - 14. Metalwork (V.A.M.). - 15. The Phasing and Dating of the Complex: An Interim Discussion (V.A.M. and D.P.S.P.). - Appendix: Site Summaries. Abbreviations and Bibliography. List of Illustrations.
bibl.seg: MAXFIELD V.A. and D.P.S. PEACOCK, with contributions by Jean BINGEN, Jean-Michel CARRIÉ, Seán GODDARD, Sheila HAMILTON-DYER, Valerie A. MAXFIELD, David P.S. PEACOCK, Marijke VAN DER VEEN and Sue WINTERBOTTOM, Survey and Excavation. Mons Claudianus 1987-1993. Volume II: Excavations. Part 1. (Fouilles de l'Institut français d'Archéologie orientale. 43.)
Le Caire, Institut français d'Archéologie orientale, 2001, 4°, xii-506 pp., 1 front., tabl., figg., cartes, plans. ISBN 2-7247-0291-3. £ég. 300.

Vol. I: 1997. - Pp. 1-4: V.A.M. and D.P.S.P., Preface and Acknowledgements. - 1. General Introduction (V.A.M. and D.P.S.P.). - 2. Excavation of the Fort Gate (D.P.S.P.). - 3.
